name: The Wild Flower's Song
description:
Made in less than 18 hours for #LD34.

Entry link RIGHT HERE!

Explore the poetry of William Blake!

A/D or the Arrow Keys to move.
Collect seeds to sprout branches.
Escape to quit (desktop).

Think Journey...

But made in 18 hours by one guy who may or may not know what he is doing.

Features:

  • Soothing minimalistic graphics
  • Soothing ambiental music that dynamically changes
  • This poem:

The Wild Flower's Song

As I wander'd the forest,
The green leaves among,
I heard a wild flower
Singing a song.

I slept in the Earth
In the silent night,
I murmur'd my fears
And I felt delight.

In the morning I went
As rosy as morn,
To seek for new joy;
But O! met with scorn.
